backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing and managing inquiries with CRUD-style submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing logo replacement requirement and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of all frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based theme variables and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling the header, sections, and footer into the main layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact form section handling inquiry submission, validation, and optional debug display.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, quick links, and detailed contact information.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive header with logo and navigation menus for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, description, and buttons that scroll to key sections.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryList: Debug-only collapsible table that loads and displays submitted inquiries using useInquiryList.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCate: Renders a grid of predefined product categories with titles and item lists.
frontend/src/components/site/ScrollToSec: Link component that smoothly scrolls to a target section on click or keyboard activation.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper section component providing consistent spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Displays service cards with icons and descriptions and includes the ProductCategories list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryList.ts: Fetches all inquiries from the backend actor with react-query, controlled by an enabled flag.
Handles inquiry form validation and submission to the backend, tracking status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state and actions using AuthClient and a React context provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/serviceInterest.ts: Maps service interest values between UI labels and backend enums and exposes option lists.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s metadata, features, issues, and image requirements for the NK SYSTECH website build.
